headline: Tiger Woods Has a New Swing Coach, But Does He Even Need One?
short_headline: Tiger Woods Has a New Swing Coach, But Does He Even Need One?
page_title: Tiger Woods New Swing Consultant Chris Como Necessary
slug: Tiger Woods Has a New Swing Coach, But Does He Even Need One?
body: Golf Magazine's Jessica Marksbury, Golf.com's Mike Walker and Sports Illustrated Mark Godich and Alan Shipnuck discuss Tiger's decision to hire swing "consultant" Chris Como — and whether that's what he really needs.
